title: Lynda- IT Security Fundamentals
description:
IT Security Fundamentals
2h 17m Intermediate Apr 03, 2013



Information security is part of every IT professional's job. Hackers are constantly trying to compromise your networks, steal sensitive data, and overwhelm your systems. Planning, implementing, enforcing, or even removing security are tasks we all do to keep users and systems safe. In this IT Security Fundamentals course by Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) and certified ethical hacker (CEH) Mike Danseglio, you'll learn how to perform these tasks properly and in alignment with industry best practicesÃ¢â‚¬â€a skill that's critical to virtually every technology role, from decision maker to developer
